name: Kirkland Consulting
goal: To provide scientific advice to companies, organisations and regulatory agencies on issues related to genotoxicity testing of chemical substances and interpretation of results.
interests: Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Clinical trial applications for pharmaceuticals, marketing applications for pharmaceuticals, REACH regulation for chemicals, EFSA assessment of food flavours, cosmetics regulation.
customers: Titanium Dioxide Manufacturers Association,Grace GmbH,EUROSIL a.i.s.b.l,Arkema,BASF,Endura,European Platinum Manufacturers Federation
